MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH41 area of Haddington, affecting properties in Old Schoolhouse and surrounding areas. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 2:26pm due to third party damage to our underground electricity network near Under Bolton Farmhouse and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 8pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2:29pm on Monday, 09 November 2020
